title: Bill Withers, Toni Braxton Interview, Clark Sisters and more.
itunes:title: Bill Withers, Toni Braxton Interview, Clark Sisters and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today's show is dedicated to those that are locked up and away. Soul legend Bill Withers passed away and The Crew share their favorite songs from the late great singer. We have a statuation which really means stay your @$$ at the house inside Church Complaints. Disco-funk producer Vaughn Mason who is best known for the single "Bounce, Rock, Skate, Roll" passed away Thursday at age 69 from natural causes. A tiger from the NYC Zoo has tested positive for coronavirus. Toni Braxton stops by the show to talk about her latest song "Do It" and more. Last week we got a little poetry from Samuel L. Jackson and Junior is back with poetry of his own. We give a huge shout out to a former set designer for Steve. Today's Closing Remarks has the crew talking about what would happen if this lock down lasted until 2021, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
